title: Ubisoft converged
author: VD
content_html: Not that we didn’t know that, but you would think game companies are actively trying to sink their own games, especially in light of the Battlefield V debacle. Of course, Kotaku is celebrating this as a major step forward for diversity in games.
content_text:
Not that we didn’t know that, but you would think game companies are actively trying to sink their own games, especially in light of the Battlefield V debacle. Of course,
